result.content:
Liferay Scenario Libraries | Selenium Plugin Documentation and Examples | Selenium Plugin Acceptance Test Examples | More Examples...[?]

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .liferay.ScenarioLibrary (edit)

import
six42.fitnesse.jdbcslim

define table type
SQLCommand as Table

variable defined: BAD_REQUEST=400
variable defined: INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR=500
variable defined: NOT_FOUND=404
variable defined: SUCCESS_CREATED=201
variable defined: SUCCESS_OK=200

variable defined: PARTY_ID=UNDEFINED
variable defined: PRODUCT_KEY=UNDEFINED
variable defined: MEMBERSHIP_ID=UNDEFINED

scenario Given scenario
@{scenario}

scenario When scenario
@{scenario}

scenario Then scenario
@{scenario}

scenario And scenario
@{scenario}

scenario the current page url should be url
check location @{url}

scenario user can see item
ensure is visible on page @{item}

scenario user can click item
ensure is enabled @{item}


scenario user see and can click item
seconds before timeout 5
user can see @{item}
user can click @{item}
show take screenshot footer

scenario a page url url
set browser size to maximum
delete all cookies
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 30
open @{url}

scenario user user sign in with username username and password password
wait for visible Sign In
click Sign In
wait for visible Email Address
enter @{username} as Email Address
enter @{password} as Password
show take screenshot loginScreen
press enter
wait for visible @{user}
show take screenshot loginSuccess

scenario a user signs in
user undefined variable: TEST_USER_FIRSTNAME sign in with username VSP and password Test123

scenario a supervisor signs in
user ruel sign in with username ruel@discovery.co.za and password test1

scenario hover over product menu
seconds before timeout 5
hover over id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId

scenario hover over product menu
seconds before timeout 5
note hover over id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId

scenario activate product menu
hover over product menu
note We have to simulate with precision as selenium tends to run the click too fast that prevents clicking of the side bar
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler"]
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler"]
wait 2 seconds
show take screenshot sideBar
check value of attribute class on id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open

scenario close product menu
hover over product menu
note We have to simulate with precision as selenium tends to run the click too fast that prevents clicking of the side bar
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open"]
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open"]
wait 2 seconds
show take screenshot sideBar
check not value of attribute class on id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open

scenario all VSP sites should be visible
note A user must be signed in first
activate product menu
seconds before timeout 10
click if available id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_manageSitesLink
show take screenshot loadingAnimation
wait for visible Select Site
wait for visible Vitality Group
wait for visible Vitality Service Portal - France
wait for visible Vitality Service Portal - Germany
show take screenshot availableSites

scenario user clicks Member Search and search using party id partyID
click xpath=//*[@id="portlet_za_co_discovery_vitality_member_quick_search_portlet_MemberQuickSearchPortlet"]/div/div/div/a
wait 2 seconds
enter @{partyID} as xpath=//*[@id="partyID"]
wait 1 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="portlet_za_co_discovery_vitality_member_quick_search_portlet_MemberQuickSearchPortlet"]/div/div/div/ul/li/form/div[1]/span/button/span
wait 7 seconds

scenario user search a member with first name firstName and surname Surname and birthdate birthdate
enter @{firstName} as xpath=//*[@id="first-name"]
enter @{surname} as xpath=//*[@id="sur-name"]
enter @{birthdate} as xpath=//*[@id="birth-date"]
wait seconds 2
click xpath=//*[@id="first-name"]
show take screenshot Party details is populated
scroll to xpath=//*[@id="searchButton"]
click xpath=//*[@id="searchButton"]
wait seconds 5
check is visible Member Search Result true
show take screenshot Search Result by Party details

scenario user search a member by reference Member Number with a value 123456
select Member Number for xpath=//*[@id="referenceType"]
enter 123456 as xpath=//*[@id="referenceValue"]
wait 2 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="memberSearchButton"]
wait 5 seconds

Import
nl.hsac.fitnesse.fixture
nl.hsac.fitnesse.fixture.slim

Import
nl.hsac.fitnesse.fixture.slim.web
nl.hsac.fitnesse.fixture.FixtureDebugTest

script selenium driver setup
start driver for chrome




Liferay Scenario Libraries | Selenium Plugin Documentation and Examples | Selenium Plugin Acceptance Test Examples | More Examples...[?]

  • Collapse

Scenario Libraries

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .liferay.ScenarioLibrary (edit)

import
six42.fitnesse.jdbcslim

define table type
SQLCommand as Table

variable defined: BAD_REQUEST=400
variable defined: INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR=500
variable defined: NOT_FOUND=404
variable defined: SUCCESS_CREATED=201
variable defined: SUCCESS_OK=200

variable defined: PARTY_ID=UNDEFINED
variable defined: PRODUCT_KEY=UNDEFINED
variable defined: MEMBERSHIP_ID=UNDEFINED

scenario Given scenario
@{scenario}

scenario When scenario
@{scenario}

scenario Then scenario
@{scenario}

scenario And scenario
@{scenario}

scenario the current page url should be url
check location @{url}

scenario user can see item
ensure is visible on page @{item}

scenario user can click item
ensure is enabled @{item}


scenario user see and can click item
seconds before timeout 5
user can see @{item}
user can click @{item}
show take screenshot footer

scenario a page url url
set browser size to maximum
delete all cookies
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 30
open @{url}

scenario user user sign in with username username and password password
wait for visible Sign In
click Sign In
wait for visible Email Address
enter @{username} as Email Address
enter @{password} as Password
show take screenshot loginScreen
press enter
wait for visible @{user}
show take screenshot loginSuccess

scenario a user signs in
user undefined variable: TEST_USER_FIRSTNAME sign in with username VSP and password Test123

scenario a supervisor signs in
user ruel sign in with username ruel@discovery.co.za and password test1

scenario hover over product menu
seconds before timeout 5
hover over id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId

scenario hover over product menu
seconds before timeout 5
note hover over id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId

scenario activate product menu
hover over product menu
note We have to simulate with precision as selenium tends to run the click too fast that prevents clicking of the side bar
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler"]
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler"]
wait 2 seconds
show take screenshot sideBar
check value of attribute class on id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open

scenario close product menu
hover over product menu
note We have to simulate with precision as selenium tends to run the click too fast that prevents clicking of the side bar
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open"]
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open"]
wait 2 seconds
show take screenshot sideBar
check not value of attribute class on id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open

scenario all VSP sites should be visible
note A user must be signed in first
activate product menu
seconds before timeout 10
click if available id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_manageSitesLink
show take screenshot loadingAnimation
wait for visible Select Site
wait for visible Vitality Group
wait for visible Vitality Service Portal - France
wait for visible Vitality Service Portal - Germany
show take screenshot availableSites

scenario user clicks Member Search and search using party id partyID
click xpath=//*[@id="portlet_za_co_discovery_vitality_member_quick_search_portlet_MemberQuickSearchPortlet"]/div/div/div/a
wait 2 seconds
enter @{partyID} as xpath=//*[@id="partyID"]
wait 1 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="portlet_za_co_discovery_vitality_member_quick_search_portlet_MemberQuickSearchPortlet"]/div/div/div/ul/li/form/div[1]/span/button/span
wait 7 seconds

scenario user search a member with first name firstName and surname Surname and birthdate birthdate
enter @{firstName} as xpath=//*[@id="first-name"]
enter @{surname} as xpath=//*[@id="sur-name"]
enter @{birthdate} as xpath=//*[@id="birth-date"]
wait seconds 2
click xpath=//*[@id="first-name"]
show take screenshot Party details is populated
scroll to xpath=//*[@id="searchButton"]
click xpath=//*[@id="searchButton"]
wait seconds 5
check is visible Member Search Result true
show take screenshot Search Result by Party details

scenario user search a member by reference Member Number with a value 123456
select Member Number for xpath=//*[@id="referenceType"]
enter 123456 as xpath=//*[@id="referenceValue"]
wait 2 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="memberSearchButton"]
wait 5 seconds
  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .liferay.VitalityMembersPortal.ScenarioLibrary (edit)

scenario a user access to vitality Member Portal
delete all cookies
wait seconds 3
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 40
set browser size to maximum
open https://test.vitalityactive.com/en/web/vitality-member-portal
wait seconds 3
show take screenshot open url

scenario login using email address email and password password
open https://test.vitalityactive.com/en/web/vitality-member-portal/login
note click Login
wait for visible Email Address
wait for visible Password
enter @{email} as xpath=//*[@id="email"]
wait seconds 1
enter @{password} as xpath=//*[@id="password"]
wait seconds 1
show take screenshot enter login
wait seconds 2
click xpath=//button[@id="login"]
wait seconds 5

scenario a user login to VMP
login using email address Weldon_McAlbert@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario an existing user login to VMP
login using email address Rosendo_McBurdick@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

  • Expand
  • Collapse

NSD

scenario a user login to VMP for NSD submission
login using email address Doria_McBills@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a user login to VMP but will not submit NSD
login using email address undefined variable: FOR_NSD2 and password TestPass123

scenario a user access VMP NSD site
wait seconds 10
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 40
set browser width 366
set browser height 708
open https://test.vitalityactive.com/en/web/vitality-member-portal/stop-smoking
wait seconds 5

  • Expand
  • Collapse

VHR

scenario a user without vhr login to VMP
login using email address Timothy_McBouchard@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a user with vhr login to VMP
login using email address Benny_McCavanaugh@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Gender

scenario male user login to VMP
login using email address Weldon_McAlbert@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario female user login to VMP
login using email address Denese_McDaugherty@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Vitality Member Status

scenario a blue member login to VMP
login using email address Camellia_McConover@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a bronze member login to VMP
login using email address Elizabeth_McBaines@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a silver member login to VMP
login using email address Eric_McBaker@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a gold member login to VMP
login using email address Deb_McChamberlin@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

  • Expand
  • Collapse

VHC

scenario a user access VMP VHC landing page
wait seconds 10
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 40
set browser width 366
set browser height 708
open https://test.vitalityactive.com/en/web/vitality-member-portal/know-your-health/health-check
wait seconds 5

scenario user agree on the terms and condition
scroll to xpath=//*[@id="agreeTermsAndCond"]
click xpath=//*[@id="checkTermsAndCond"]
wait 1 seconds
check is enabled xpath=//*[@id="agreeTermsAndCond"] true
click xpath=//*[@id="agreeTermsAndCond"]
wait 10 seconds
show take screenshot terms


  • Expand
  • Collapse

RESPONSIVE


scenario a user access VMP site
delete all cookies
wait seconds 3
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 40
open https://test.vitalityactive.com/en/web/vitality-member-portal
wait seconds 3

scenario user enters credential with username username and password password
enter @{username} as xpath=//*[@id="email"]
enter @{password} as xpath=//*[@id="password"]
click xpath=//*[@id="login"]
wait 3 seconds

scenario user resize the browser to android version
set browser width 372
set browser height 770
wait seconds 2
show take screenshot Captured-screenshot

scenario user check the browsers width and height
current browser width
current browser height

scenario user resize the browser to ios version
set browser width 414
set browser height 736
wait seconds 2
show take screenshot Captured-screenshot

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Login

scenario user login to VMP site
user enters credential with username Abram_McCaudill@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario user login to VMP site to view Terms and Condition
user enters credential with username Anibal_McChavarria@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario user login to VMP site to disagree on Terms and Condition
user enters credential with username Hans_McAcevedo@mailinator.com and password TestPass123
click xpath=//*[@id="termsAndCondModal"]/div/div/div[1]/button

scenario a user login using incorrect credentials
user enters credential with username kwspopudzw@sample.com and password TestPass
wait 3 seconds
show take screenshot Incorrect Credentials Modal

scenario a user login using locked account
user enters credential with username Adelaide_McDietrich@mailinator.com and password TestPass123
wait 3 seconds

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Registration

scenario user enters credential for registration with username username and password password and insurer code insurercode
enter @{username} as xpath=//*[@id="email"]
enter @{password} as xpath=//*[@id="password"]
enter @{password} as xpath=//*[@id="confirm_password"]
enter @{insurercode} as xpath=//*[@id="insurer_code"]
click xpath=//*[@id="submitRegForm"]
wait 3 seconds

scenario user register an existing account
user enters credential for registration with username Weldon_McAlbert@mailinator.com and password TestPass123 and insurer code 2505403741
wait 1 seconds

scenario user registers to view the Terms and Conditions
user enters credential for registration with username Burl_McBurrell@mailinator.com and password TestPass123 and insurer code 2505423734
wait 5 seconds

scenario user register to disagree on Terms and Conditions
user enters credential for registration with username Jefferey_McBlevins@mailinator.com and password TestPass123 and insurer code 2505427979
wait 5 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="termsAndCondModal"]/div/div/div[1]/button

scenario user registers with incorrect email or insurer code
user enters credential for registration with username MFabian_McDamico@mailinator.com and password TestPass123 and insurer code 2505424253
wait 1 seconds

  • Expand
  • Collapse

NSD

scenario a user login to VMP for NSD submitted
login using email address Stefan_Ashcraft@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Dashboard

scenario a user login to VMP Dashboard
login using email address Stefan_Ashcraft@mailinator.com and password TestPass123
set browser width 372
set browser height 770
wait seconds 5
  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .liferay.VitalityMembersPortal.VMPResponsiveDesign.ScenarioLibrary (edit)

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Vitality Health Review

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Landing Page

scenario user navigates to Vitality Health Review Landing page
hover over xpath=//*[@id="layout_2"]/a/span
click xpath=//*[@id="layout_106"]/a
wait for visible id=vhr-header

scenario user scroll to BMI section
scroll to xpath=//*[@id="vhrMainContent"]/div/div[1]/div[3]/div/div

scenario user scroll to complete later button
scroll to xpath=//*[@id="vhrMainContent"]/div/div[1]/div[5]/div/button[1]

scenario user clicks the Start Assessment button to view the VHR Overall page
click xpath xpath=//*[@id="vhrMainContent"]/div/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/button
wait for visible xpath=//*[@id="tab0"]/div




  • Expand
  • Collapse

Vitality Health Check

scenario click Claim Points
click xpath=//*[@id="btn-claim"]
wait seconds 10
show take screenshot VMP VHC page step 1

scenario scroll to health attributes selection
scroll to xpath=//*[@id="pointsSubmissionPageOne"]/div[2]/div[3]/div[1]/div

scenario User selects all health attributes and click next button
click xpath=//*[@id="vhc_BloodPressure"]
click xpath=//*[@id="vhc_BMI"]
click xpath=//*[@id="vhc_Cholesterol"]
click xpath=//*[@id="vhc_Urinary"]
click xpath=//*[@id="vhc_BloodGlucose"]
click xpath=//*[@id="nextBtnPageOne"]
wait seconds 5

scenario a user enters values for health attribute and click next
enter 175 as xpath=//*[@id="_za_co_vitality_portal_members_vhc_VHCClaimPointsPortlet_INSTANCE_Fb4Hb1yXGfQ4_Height"]
enter 75 as xpath=//*[@id="_za_co_vitality_portal_members_vhc_VHCClaimPointsPortlet_INSTANCE_Fb4Hb1yXGfQ4_Weight"]
enter 120 as xpath=//*[@id="_za_co_vitality_portal_members_vhc_VHCClaimPointsPortlet_INSTANCE_Fb4Hb1yXGfQ4_BloodPressureSystol"]
enter 80 as xpath=//*[@id="_za_co_vitality_portal_members_vhc_VHCClaimPointsPortlet_INSTANCE_Fb4Hb1yXGfQ4_BloodPressureDiasto"]
enter 3 as xpath=//*[@id="_za_co_vitality_portal_members_vhc_VHCClaimPointsPortlet_INSTANCE_Fb4Hb1yXGfQ4_LDLCholesterol"]
enter 3 as xpath=//*[@id="_za_co_vitality_portal_members_vhc_VHCClaimPointsPortlet_INSTANCE_Fb4Hb1yXGfQ4_FastingGlucose"]
enter 3 as xpath=//*[@id="_za_co_vitality_portal_members_vhc_VHCClaimPointsPortlet_INSTANCE_Fb4Hb1yXGfQ4_HbA1c"]
click xpath=//*[@id="option_2"]/input
click xpath=//*[@id="nextBtnPageTwo"]

script browser test
Given a user access VMP site
scenario Given scenario
a user access VMP site
scenario a user access VMP site
delete all cookies
wait seconds 3
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 40
open
Timed-out waiting (after 40s).
Page content:
 https://test.vitalityactive.com/en/web/vitality-member-portal
wait seconds Test not run 3
When user login to VMP site
scenario When scenario
user login to VMP site
scenario user login to VMP site
user enters credential with username Abram_McCaudill@mailinator.com and password TestPass123
scenario user enters credential with username username and password password
enter Test not run Abram_McCaudill@mailinator.com as xpath=//*[@id="email"]
enter Test not run TestPass123 as xpath=//*[@id="password"]
click Test not run xpath=//*[@id="login"]
wait Test not run 3 seconds
And user navigates to Vitality Health Review Landing page
scenario And scenario
user navigates to Vitality Health Review Landing page
scenario user navigates to Vitality Health Review Landing page
hover over Test not run xpath=//*[@id="layout_2"]/a/span
click Test not run xpath=//*[@id="layout_106"]/a
wait for visible Test not run id=vhr-header
And user clicks the Start Assessment button to view the VHR Overall page
scenario And scenario
user clicks the Start Assessment button to view the VHR Overall page
scenario user clicks the Start Assessment button to view the VHR Overall page
click Test not run xpath xpath=//*[@id="vhrMainContent"]/div/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/button
wait for visible Test not run xpath=//*[@id="tab0"]/div
Then user resize the browser to android version
scenario Then scenario
user resize the browser to android version
scenario user resize the browser to android version
set browser width Test not run 372
set browser height Test not run 770
wait seconds Test not run 2
show Test not run take screenshot Captured-screenshot

script layout test Test not run
show Test not run verify layout using http://files/VitalityHealthReview/VHRLOverall.txt
show Test not run layout check messages
check passed spec count >0 Test not run
check spec error count 0 Test not run

scenario user search a member by reference Member Number with a value 123456
select Member Number for xpath=//*[@id="referenceType"]
enter 123456 as xpath=//*[@id="referenceValue"]
wait 2 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="memberSearchButton"]
wait 5 seconds

script selenium driver setup
show run summary null
stop driver
